document_data.name: Priatl
document_data.mainbody: '''Priatl''' was one of the three leaders of the [[Azatl]] settlement in [[Nexal]] in [[1362 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Priatl ruled over the territory alongside the human quarter and the human market. In his territory's restricted areas, [[human]]s must be killed on sign.
document_data.Personality: Priatl was a kind of religious fanatic. He believed that they lived in a new world where the [[Viperhands]] would rule over humans. He believed [[Jeordros]] a fool and [[Michitl]] too weak, so in his mind he was the best candidate to be leader of all Azatl.
